activities: Digital Measures is provided with personal information by educational institutions so they may more easily prepare reports for educational accrediting bodies, governments, and the educational institutions through the use of Digital Measures' online software.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line; in some cases, HR data.  Manually processed data.
recoursemech: Digital Measures is committed to dealing with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs), or elsewhere, including Switzerland (Swiss FDPIC), or their authorized representatives.
